project_plan.name: Python-based Quiz Game
project_plan.description: Develop a simple Python-based quiz game that presents multiple-choice questions, tracks the user's score, and displays the final score at the end of the game.

task.name: Design the structure for storing questions and multiple-choice answers
Implement functionality to present each question to the user and capture their answer
Develop a scoring system to track the user's correct answers
Create a summary display at the end of the quiz to show the user's score
Write tests for each part of the quiz game
Execute tests to verify that the quiz game functions correctly
